meanings.sent1: The tree branches were outthrusting towards the sky.
meanings.sent2: She outthrusts her hand to grab the falling leaf.
meanings.sent3: The curious squirrel outthrusting its nose from the tree hole.
meanings.sent4: His ambition outthrusting like a rocket reaching for the stars.
meanings.sent5: The outthrusting mountain peaks painted a majestic view.

meanings.sent1: The sword outthrusting from the stone caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The snake outthrusts its tongue to sense its surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The toast popped out of the toaster, outthrusting into the air.
meanings.sent4: The idea outthrusting from his mind was too brilliant to ignore.
meanings.sent5: The outthrusting roots of the tree created a natural barrier.
